errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Invalid authority.

errors.name: ProposalNotActive
errors.msg: This proposal is not active. Try creating a new one.

errors.name: VotingPeriodInactive
errors.msg: The voting period for this proposal is currently inactive.

errors.name: Overflow
errors.msg: An overflow has occurred. Please try again.

errors.name: InvalidProposalData
errors.msg: An invalid data was parsed. Please try again.

errors.name: VotingPeriodNotEnded
errors.msg: Voting period has not yet concluded. Please try again later.

errors.name: InvalidParameterName
errors.msg: This paramter name does not exist. Please try again.

errors.name: MissingNFTConfig
errors.msg: Missing NFT Config. Please try again.

errors.name: MissingSPLConfig
errors.msg: Missing SPL Config. Please try again.

errors.name: NoGovernanceTokenSpecified
errors.msg: Atleast one type of governance token must be specified. Please try again.

errors.name: MissingRequiredAccount
errors.msg: Missing required account to continue. Please try again.

errors.name: InvalidSPLMint
errors.msg: This SPL Mint is invalid. Please try again.

errors.name: InvalidNFTMint
errors.msg: This NFT Mint is invalid. Please try again.

errors.name: InvalidMint
errors.msg: This mint is invalid. Please try again.

errors.name: InsufficientStake
errors.msg: You do not have up to this amount to unstake. Please try again later.

errors.name: StakeLocked
errors.msg: This stake is locked. Please try again later.

errors.name: StakeTooLow
errors.msg: This stake is below minimum amount. Please try again later.

errors.name: ExceedsSupply
errors.msg: Amount minted has exceeded the total supply. Please try again later.

errors.name: ExceedsAvailableVotingPower
errors.msg: Insufficient voting power. Please try staking more tokens for more voting power.

errors.name: InvalidNFTStake
errors.msg: Insufficient amount to unstake. Please try staking more tokens for more voting power.

errors.name: InsufficientTokens
errors.msg: Insufficient tokens

errors.name: NftMintNotSet
errors.msg: NFT Mint not set

errors.msg: SPL mint not set

errors.msg: Invite expired
